title: Assess Exploration Prospect Risk
description: A management team assesses the geological and economic risks of a potential drilling prospect before approving funding.

tasks.description: Review the geoscientist's assessment of the prospect, including source rock, reservoir, trap, and seal.
tasks.expected_outcome: The key geological risks are understood.

tasks.description: Run a Monte Carlo simulation to generate a probabilistic distribution of potential reservoir volumes (P10, P50, P90).
tasks.expected_outcome: A range of possible outcomes for oil in place is calculated.

tasks.description: Calculate the project's expected monetary value (EMV) based on the volumes, costs, and chance of success to support a go/no-go decision.
tasks.expected_outcome: The project EMV is calculated, providing a key metric for the investment decision.
